mlDocs.author: Gabriel Laera, Marco Quaresma, Vitor Guimarães

an3.11:1.1.pli: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ñāto bhikkhu bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanadukkhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an3.11:1.1.pt: “Bhikkhus, um bhikkhu renomado que tenha três características age pelo mal-estar e infelicidade dos outros, pelo mal-estar e infelicidade de devas e humanos.
an3.11:1.1.en: “Mendicants, a well-known mendicant who has three qualities is acting for the detriment and suffering of the people, against the people, for the harm, detriment, and suffering of gods and humans.

an3.11:1.4.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ñāto bhikkhu bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanadukkhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an3.11:1.4.pt: Um bhikkhu renomado que tenha estas três características age pelo mal-estar e infelicidade dos outros, pelo mal-estar e infelicidade de devas e humanos.
an3.11:1.4.en: A well-known mendicant who has these three qualities is acting for the detriment and suffering of the people, against the people, for the harm, detriment, and suffering of gods and humans.

an3.11:2.1.pli: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ñāto bhikkhu bahujanahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an3.11:2.1.pt: “Bhikkhus, um bhikkhu renomado que tenha três características age pelo bem-estar e felicidade dos outros, pelo bem-estar e felicidade de devas e humanos.
an3.11:2.1.en: A well-known mendicant who has three qualities is acting for the welfare and happiness of the people, for the people, for the benefit, welfare, and happiness of gods and humans.

an3.11:2.4.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ñāto bhikkhu bahujanahitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan”ti.
an3.11:2.4.pt: Um bhikkhu renomado que tenha estas três características age pelo bem-estar e felicidade dos outros, pelo bem-estar e felicidade de devas e humanos.”
an3.11:2.4.en: A well-known mendicant who has these three qualities is acting for the welfare and happiness of the people, for the people, for the benefit, welfare, and happiness of gods and humans.”

mlDocs.title:
Aṅguttara Nikāya 3
2. O Construtor de Carruagens
11. Renomado

mlDocs.author: Gabriel Laera, Marco Quaresma, Vitor Guimarães

an3.3:1.1.pt: “Bhikkhus, existem essas três características, sinais e manifestações de um tolo.
an3.3:1.1.en: “There are these three characteristics, signs, and manifestations of a fool.

an3.3:1.8.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni bālanimittāni bālāpadānāni.
an3.3:1.8.pt: Essas são, bhikkhus, as três características, sinais e manifestações de um tolo.
an3.3:1.8.en: These are the three characteristics, signs, and manifestations of a fool.

an3.3:2.1.pli: Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni paṇḍitanimittāni paṇḍitāpadānāni.
an3.3:2.1.pt: Bhikkhus, existem essas três características, sinais e manifestações de uma pessoa sábia.
an3.3:2.1.en: There are these three characteristics, signs, and manifestations of an astute person.

an3.3:2.8.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni paṇḍitanimittāni paṇḍitāpadānāni.
an3.3:2.8.pt: Bhikkhus, essas são três características, sinais e manifestações de uma pessoa sábia.
an3.3:2.8.en: These are the three characteristics, signs, and manifestations of an astute person.

mlDocs.title:
Aṅguttara Nikāya 3
10. Tolos
3. Pensando
